text: Ife tidavumbulutsa chifuniro chathu kwa iye ponena kuti, “Khoma chombo chimene Ife tidzayang’anira molingana ndi chilangizo chathu. Pamene chiweruzo chathu chidza ndipo madzi asefukira kuchokera ku ng’anjo, utenge zolengedwa ziwiriziwiri, zazimuna ndi zazikazi ndiponso kuchokera kwa iwo a m’nyumba mwako kupatula okhawo amene adanenedwa kuti adzaonongeka. Usandipemphe kuti ndipulumutse iwo amene adachita zoipa chifukwa iwo adzamizidwa.”
